Name: Chakde! India
Credit: Dir: Shimit Amin With: Shah Rukh Khan, Vidya Malvade, Tanya Abrol
Outline: A disgraced hockey player coaches the women's national team to win back his honor and dignity.

Name: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
Credit: Dir: Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra With: Farhan Akhtar, Sonam Kapoor, Pavan Malhotra
Outline: The truth behind the ascension of Milkha "The Flying Sikh" Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

Name: Raging Bull
Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Robert De Niro, Cathy Moriarty, Joe Pesci
Outline: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.

Name: Warrior
Credit: Dir: Gavin O'Connor With: Tom Hardy, Nick Nolte, Joel Edgerton
Outline: The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

Name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
Credit: Dir: Ashutosh Gowariker With: Aamir Khan, Gracy Singh, Rachel Shelley
Outline: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

Name: Rush
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Daniel BrÃ¼hl, Chris Hemsworth, Olivia Wilde
Outline: The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda .

Name: Million Dollar Baby
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Hilary Swank, Clint Eastwood, Morgan Freeman
Outline: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

Name: Ip Man
Credit: Dir: Wilson Yip With: Donnie Yen, Simon Yam, Siu-Wong Fan
Outline: A semi-biographical account of Yip Man, the successful martial arts master who taught the Chinese martial art of Wing Chun to the world.

Name: Rocky
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
Outline: Rocky Balboa, a small-time boxer, gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion, Apollo Creed, in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

Name: The Hustler
Credit: Dir: Robert Rossen With: Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, Piper Laurie
Outline: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

Name: Cinderella Man
Credit: Dir: Ron Howard With: Russell Crowe, RenÃ©e Zellweger, Craig Bierko
Outline: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

Name: The Wrestler
Credit: Dir: Darren Aronofsky With: Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood
Outline: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

Name: The Fighter
Credit: Dir: David O. Russell With: Mark Wahlberg, Christian Bale, Amy Adams
Outline: A look at the early years of boxer "Irish" Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

Name: The World's Fastest Indian
Credit: Dir: Roger Donaldson With: Anthony Hopkins, Diane Ladd, Iain Rea
Outline: The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

Name: The Sandlot
Credit: Dir: David M. Evans With: Tom Guiry, Mike Vitar, Patrick Renna
Outline: A new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his team in this coming of age movie set in the summer of 1962. Together, they get themselves into many adventures involving rival teams, lifeguards, and a vicious dog.

Name: Creed
Credit: Dir: Ryan Coogler With: Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone, Tessa Thompson
Outline: The former World Heavyweight Champion Rocky Balboa serves as a trainer and mentor to Adonis Johnson, the son of his late friend and former rival Apollo Creed.

Name: Remember the Titans
Credit: Dir: Boaz Yakin With: Denzel Washington, Will Patton, Wood Harris
Outline: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

Name: The Blind Side
Credit: Dir: John Lee Hancock With: Quinton Aaron, Sandra Bullock, Tim McGraw
Outline: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

Name: Fearless
Credit: Dir: Ronny Yu With: Jet Li, Li Sun, Yong Dong
Outline: A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

Name: The Big Blue
Credit: Dir: Luc Besson With: Jean-Marc Barr, Jean Reno, Rosanna Arquette
Outline: Enzo and Jacques have known each other for a long time. Their friendship started in their childhood days in the Mediterranean...

Name: Ip Man 2
Credit: Dir: Wilson Yip With: Donnie Yen, Xiaoming Huang, Sammo Kam-Bo Hung
Outline: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

Name: Moneyball
Credit: Dir: Bennett Miller With: Brad Pitt, Robin Wright, Jonah Hill
Outline: Oakland A's general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to assemble a baseball team on a lean budget by employing computer-generated analysis to acquire new players.

Name: Hoosiers
Credit: Dir: David Anspaugh With: Gene Hackman, Barbara Hershey, Dennis Hopper
Outline: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

Name: The Hurricane
Credit: Dir: Norman Jewison With: Denzel Washington, Vicellous Reon Shannon, Deborah Kara Unger
Outline: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

Name: The Damned United
Credit: Dir: Tom Hooper With: Colm Meaney, Henry Goodman, David Roper
Outline: The story of the controversial Brian Clough 's 44-day reign as the coach of the English football club Leeds United.

Name: Field of Dreams
Credit: Dir: Phil Alden Robinson With: Kevin Costner, James Earl Jones, Ray Liotta
Outline: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the Chicago White Sox come.

Name: The Natural
Credit: Dir: Barry Levinson With: Robert Redford, Robert Duvall, Glenn Close
Outline: An unknown comes out of seemingly nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.

Name: Rudy
Credit: Dir: David Anspaugh With: Sean Astin, Jon Favreau, Ned Beatty
Outline: Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.

Credit: Dir: Brian Helgeland With: Chadwick Boseman, T.R. Knight, Harrison Ford
Outline: The story of Jackie Robinson from his signing with the Brooklyn Dodgers organization in 1945 to his historic 1947 rookie season when he broke the color barrier in Major League Baseball.

Name: Green Street Hooligans
Credit: Dir: Lexi Alexander With: Elijah Wood, Charlie Hunnam, Claire Forlani
Outline: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

Name: Miracle
Credit: Dir: Gavin O'Connor With: Kurt Russell, Patricia Clarkson, Nathan West
Outline: Miracle tells the true story of Herb Brooks (Russell), the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Russian squad.

Name: Undisputed 3: Redemption
Credit: Dir: Isaac Florentine With: Scott Adkins, Mykel Shannon Jenkins, Mark Ivanir
Outline: Boyka is back. This time he is fighting in the first ever inter-prison tournament with one knee.

Name: Southpaw
Credit: Dir: Antoine Fuqua With: Jake Gyllenhaal, Rachel McAdams, Oona Laurence
Outline: Boxer Billy Hope turns to trainer Tick Wills to help him get his life back on track after losing his wife in a tragic accident and his daughter to child protection services.

Name: Slap Shot
Credit: Dir: George Roy Hill With: Paul Newman, Michael Ontkean, Strother Martin
Outline: A failing ice hockey team finds success using constant fighting and violence during games.

Name: Caddyshack
Credit: Dir: Harold Ramis With: Chevy Chase, Rodney Dangerfield, Bill Murray
Outline: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

Name: Invictus
Credit: Dir: Clint Eastwood With: Morgan Freeman, Matt Damon, Tony Kgoroge
Outline: Nelson Mandela, in his first term as the South African President, initiates a unique venture to unite the apartheid-torn land: enlist the national rugby team on a mission to win the 1995 Rugby World Cup.

Name: Seabiscuit
Credit: Dir: Gary Ross With: Tobey Maguire, Jeff Bridges, Elizabeth Banks
Outline: True story of the undersized Depression-era racehorse whose victories lifted not only the spirits of the team behind it but also those of their nation.

Name: The Basketball Diaries
Credit: Dir: Scott Kalvert With: Leonardo DiCaprio, Lorraine Bracco, Marilyn Sokol
Outline: A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.

Name: Shaolin Soccer
Credit: Dir: Stephen Chow With: Stephen Chow, Wei Zhao, Yat-Fei Wong
Outline: A young Shaolin follower reunites with his discouraged brothers to form a soccer team using their martial art skills to their advantage.

Name: Jerry Maguire
Credit: Dir: Cameron Crowe With: Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr., RenÃ©e Zellweger
Outline: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent with the only athlete who stays with him.

Name: Friday Night Lights
Credit: Dir: Peter Berg With: Billy Bob Thornton, Jay Hernandez, Derek Luke
Outline: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.

Name: Chariots of Fire
Credit: Dir: Hugh Hudson With: Ben Cross, Ian Charleson, Nicholas Farrell
Outline: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

Name: Coach Carter
Credit: Dir: Thomas Carter With: Samuel L. Jackson, Rick Gonzalez, Robert Ri'chard
Outline: Controversy surrounds high school basketball coach Ken Carter after he benches his entire team for breaking their academic contract with him.

Name: Glory Road
Credit: Dir: James Gartner With: Josh Lucas, Derek Luke, Austin Nichols
Outline: In 1966, Texas Western coach Don Haskins led the first all-black starting line-up for a college basketball team to the NCAA national championship.

Name: Rocky Balboa
Credit: Dir: Sylvester Stallone With: Sylvester Stallone, Antonio Tarver, Milo Ventimiglia
Outline: Thirty years after the ring of the first bell, Rocky Balboa comes out of retirement and dons his gloves for his final fight; against the reigning heavyweight champ Mason 'The Line' Dixon.

Name: The Karate Kid
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Elisabeth Shue
Outline: A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach a bullied boy karate and shows him that there is more to the martial art than fighting.

Name: Major League
Credit: Dir: David S. Ward With: Tom Berenger, Charlie Sheen, Corbin Bernsen
Outline: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a purposely horrible team so they'll lose and she can move the team. But when the plot is uncovered, they start winning just to spite her.

Name: A League of Their Own
Credit: Dir: Penny Marshall With: Tom Hanks, Geena Davis, Lori Petty
Outline: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.

Name: Cars
Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Joe Ranft With: Owen Wilson, Bonnie Hunt, Paul Newman
Outline: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

Name: Win Win
Credit: Dir: Tom McCarthy With: Paul Giamatti, Amy Ryan, Jeffrey Tambor
Outline: A struggling lawyer and volunteer wrestling coach's chicanery comes back to haunt him when the teenage grandson of the client he has double-crossed comes into his life.

Name: Unbroken
Credit: Dir: Angelina Jolie With: Jack O'Connell, Miyavi, Domhnall Gleeson
Outline: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

Name: Rocky II
Credit: Dir: Sylvester Stallone With: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
Outline: Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.

Name: The Legend Is Born: Ip Man
Credit: Dir: Herman Yau With: Yu-Hang To, Yi Huang, Biao Yuen
Outline: Yip Man's resistance against invading foreigners, along with his romantic relations while under the tutelage of three Wing Chun masters.

Name: Bull Durham
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Kevin Costner, Susan Sarandon, Tim Robbins
Outline: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

Name: Concussion
Credit: Dir: Peter Landesman With: Will Smith, Alec Baldwin, Albert Brooks
Outline: In Pittsburgh, accomplished pathologist Dr. Bennet Omalu uncovers the truth about brain damage in football players who suffer repeated concussions in the course of normal play.

Name: Lords of Dogtown
Credit: Dir: Catherine Hardwicke With: Heath Ledger, Emile Hirsch, Victor Rasuk
Outline: The film follows the surf and skateboarding trends that originated in Venice, California during the 1970's.

Name: Soul Surfer
Credit: Dir: Sean McNamara With: AnnaSophia Robb, Dennis Quaid, Helen Hunt
Outline: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

Name: We Are Marshall
Credit: Dir: McG With: Matthew McConaughey, Matthew Fox, Anthony Mackie
Outline: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

Name: Real Steel
Credit: Dir: Shawn Levy With: Hugh Jackman, Evangeline Lilly, Dakota Goyo
Outline: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot.

Name: Invincible
Credit: Dir: Ericson Core With: Mark Wahlberg, Greg Kinnear, Elizabeth Banks
Outline: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.

Name: Million Dollar Arm
Credit: Dir: Craig Gillespie With: Jon Hamm, Aasif Mandvi, Alan Arkin
Outline: A sports agent stages an unconventional recruitment strategy to get talented Indian cricket players to play Major League Baseball.

Name: Foxcatcher
Credit: Dir: Bennett Miller With: Steve Carell, Channing Tatum, Mark Ruffalo
Outline: Mark and Dave Schultz, U.S. Olympic Wrestling champions, join Team Foxcatcher led by multimillionaire John E. du Pont as they train for the 1988 games in Seoul - but John's emotional self-destruction threatens to consume them all.

Name: Happy Gilmore
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: Adam Sandler, Christopher McDonald, Julie Bowen
Outline: A rejected hockey player puts his skills to the golf course to save his grandmother's house.

Name: The Color of Money
Credit: Dir: Martin Scorsese With: Paul Newman, Tom Cruise, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
Outline: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Name: The Rookie
Credit: Dir: John Lee Hancock With: Dennis Quaid, J.D. Evermore, Rachel Griffiths
Outline: A Texas baseball coach makes the major league after agreeing to try out if his high school team made the playoffs.

Name: He Got Game
Credit: Dir: Spike Lee With: Denzel Washington, Milla Jovovich, Ray Allen
Outline: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

Name: Gridiron Gang
Credit: Dir: Phil Joanou With: Dwayne Johnson, Xzibit, L. Scott Caldwell
Outline: Teenagers at a juvenile detention center, under the leadership of their counselor, gain self-esteem by playing football together.

Name: Radio
Credit: Dir: Michael Tollin With: Cuba Gooding Jr., Ed Harris, Debra Winger
Outline: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man whom he took under his wing.

Name: Whip It
Credit: Dir: Drew Barrymore With: Ellen Page, Drew Barrymore, Kristen Wiig
Outline: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

Name: Kingpin
Credit: Dir: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly With: Woody Harrelson, Randy Quaid, Bill Murray
Outline: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

Name: Cool Runnings
Credit: Dir: Jon Turteltaub With: John Candy, Leon, Doug E. Doug
Outline: When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified to the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.

Name: Any Given Sunday
Credit: Dir: Oliver Stone With: Al Pacino, Dennis Quaid, Cameron Diaz
Outline: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

Name: Goon
Credit: Dir: Michael Dowse With: Seann William Scott, Jay Baruchel, Alison Pill
Outline: Labeled an outcast by his brainy family, a bouncer overcomes long odds to lead a team of under performing misfits to semi-pro hockey glory, beating the crap out of everything that stands in his way.

Name: Trouble with the Curve
Credit: Dir: Robert Lorenz With: Clint Eastwood, Amy Adams, John Goodman
Outline: A daughter tries to remedy her dysfunctional relationship with her ailing father, a decorated baseball scout by helping him in a recruiting trip which could be his last.

Name: Draft Day
Credit: Dir: Ivan Reitman With: Kevin Costner, Chadwick Boseman, Jennifer Garner
Outline: At the NFL Draft, general manager Sonny Weaver has the opportunity to rebuild his team when he trades for the number one pick. He must decide what he's willing to sacrifice on a life-changing day for a few hundred young men with NFL dreams.

Name: Bloodsport
Credit: Dir: Newt Arnold With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Donald Gibb, Leah Ayres
Outline: Follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

Name: Surf's Up
Credit: Dir: Ash Brannon, Chris Buck With: Shia LaBeouf, Zooey Deschanel, Jon Heder
Outline: A behind-the-scenes look at the annual Penguin World Surfing Championship, and its newest participant, up-and-comer Cody Maverick.

Name: Ali
Credit: Dir: Michael Mann With: Will Smith, Jamie Foxx, Jon Voight
Outline: A biography of sports legend, Muhammad Ali, from his early days to his days in the ring.

Name: Goal! The Dream Begins
Credit: Dir: Danny Cannon With: Kuno Becker, Alessandro Nivola, Anna Friel
Outline: The extremely talented Santiago Munez is given a chance at professional football, after being spotted by a scout who has ties with Newcastle United.

Name: Rocky IV
Credit: Dir: Sylvester Stallone With: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
Outline: After iron man Drago, a highly intimidating 6-foot-5, 261-pound Soviet athlete, kills Apollo Creed in an exhibition match, Rocky comes to the heart of Russia for 15 pile-driving boxing rounds of revenge.

Name: Rocky III
Credit: Dir: Sylvester Stallone With: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
Outline: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

Name: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
Credit: Dir: Rawson Marshall Thurber With: Ben Stiller, Christine Taylor, Vince Vaughn
Outline: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.

Name: The Legend of Bagger Vance
Credit: Dir: Robert Redford With: Will Smith, Matt Damon, Charlize Theron
Outline: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.

Name: Bend It Like Beckham
Credit: Dir: Gurinder Chadha With: Parminder Nagra, Keira Knightley, Jonathan Rhys Meyers
Outline: The daughter of orthodox Sikh rebels against her parents' traditionalism and joins a football team (soccer in America).

Name: White Men Can't Jump
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Wesley Snipes, Woody Harrelson, Rosie Perez
Outline: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances.

Name: Run, Fatboy, Run
Credit: Dir: David Schwimmer With: Simon Pegg, Thandie Newton, Hank Azaria
Outline: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

Name: Never Back Down
Credit: Dir: Jeff Wadlow With: Sean Faris, Djimon Hounsou, Amber Heard
Outline: A frustrated and conflicted teenager arrives at a new highschool to discover an underground fightclub and meet a classmate who begins to coerce him into fighting.

Name: BASEketball
Credit: Dir: David Zucker With: Trey Parker, Matt Stone, Dian Bachar
Outline: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.

Name: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
Credit: Dir: Adam McKay With: Will Ferrell, John C. Reilly, Sacha Baron Cohen
Outline: #1 NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.

Name: For Love of the Game
Credit: Dir: Sam Raimi With: Kevin Costner, Kelly Preston, John C. Reilly
Outline: A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.

Name: The Replacements
Credit: Dir: Howard Deutch With: Keanu Reeves, Gene Hackman, Brooke Langton
Outline: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

Name: Mean Machine
Credit: Dir: Barry Skolnick With: Vinnie Jones, David Kelly, David Hemmings
Outline: A soccer star jailed for assault leads a group of inmates in a match against prison guards.

Name: Turbo
Credit: Dir: David Soren With: Ryan Reynolds, Paul Giamatti, Maya Rudolph
Outline: A freak accident might just help an everyday garden snail achieve his biggest dream: winning the Indy 500.

Name: Here Comes the Boom
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Kevin James, Salma Hayek, Henry Winkler
Outline: A high school biology teacher looks to become a successful mixed-martial arts fighter in an effort to raise money to prevent extra-curricular activities from being axed at his cash-strapped school.

Name: Grudge Match
Credit: Dir: Peter Segal With: Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Kim Basinger
Outline: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.

Name: The Mighty Ducks
Credit: Dir: Stephen Herek With: Emilio Estevez, Joss Ackland, Lane Smith
Outline: A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

Name: Varsity Blues
Credit: Dir: Brian Robbins With: James Van Der Beek, Jon Voight, Paul Walker
Outline: A back-up quarterback is chosen to lead a Texas football team to victory after the star quarterback is injured.

Name: The Longest Yard
Credit: Dir: Peter Segal With: Adam Sandler, Burt Reynolds, Chris Rock
Outline: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

Name: Kickboxer
Credit: Dir: Mark DiSalle, David Worth With: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dennis Alexio, Dennis Chan
Outline: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.

Name: Wimbledon
Credit: Dir: Richard Loncraine With: Kirsten Dunst, Paul Bettany, Jon Favreau
Outline: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and has fallen in rank to 119. Fortunately for him, he meets a young player on the women's circuit who helps him recapture his focus for Wimbledon.

Name: Blades of Glory
Credit: Dir: Josh Gordon, Will Speck With: Will Ferrell, Jon Heder, Amy Poehler
Outline: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

Name: Tin Cup
Credit: Dir: Ron Shelton With: Kevin Costner, Rene Russo, Don Johnson
Outline: A washed up golf pro working at a driving range tries to qualify for the US Open in order to win the heart of his succesful rival's girlfriend.

Name: Cars 2
Credit: Dir: John Lasseter, Brad Lewis With: Owen Wilson, Larry the Cable Guy, Michael Caine
Outline: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

Name: Space Jam
Genre: Animation | Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Sci-Fi | Sport
Credit: Dir: Joe Pytka With: Michael Jordan, Wayne Knight, Theresa Randle
Outline: Michael Jordan agrees to help the Looney Tunes play a basketball game vs. alien slavers to determine their freedom.

Name: Two for the Money
Credit: Dir: D.J. Caruso With: Matthew McConaughey, Al Pacino, Rene Russo
Outline: After suffering a career-ending injury, a former college football star aligns himself with one of the most renowned touts in the sports-gambling business.

Name: Fever Pitch
Credit: Dir: Bobby Farrelly, Peter Farrelly With: Drew Barrymore, Jimmy Fallon, Jason Spevack
Outline: Lindsay is stuck in the middle of her relationship with Ben and his passion for the Boston Red Sox.

Name: The Karate Kid
Credit: Dir: Harald Zwart With: Jackie Chan, Jaden Smith, Taraji P. Henson
Outline: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

Name: The Game Plan
Credit: Dir: Andy Fickman With: Dwayne Johnson, Kyra Sedgwick, Madison Pettis
Outline: An NFL quarterback living the bachelor lifestyle discovers that he has an 8-year-old daughter from a previous relationship.

Name: The Cannonball Run
Credit: Dir: Hal Needham With: Burt Reynolds, Roger Moore, Farrah Fawcett
Outline: A wide variety of eccentric competitors participate in a wild and illegal cross-country road race. However, the eccentric entrants will do anything to win the road race, including low-down, dirty tricks.

Name: Speed Racer
Credit: Dir: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski With: Emile Hirsch, Matthew Fox, Christina Ricci
Outline: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.

Name: The Waterboy
Credit: Dir: Frank Coraci With: Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler
Outline: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

Name: Leatherheads
Credit: Dir: George Clooney With: George Clooney, RenÃ©e Zellweger, John Krasinski
Outline: In 1925, an enterprising pro football player convinces America's too-good-to-be-true college football hero to play for his team and keep the league from going under.

Name: Bring It On
Credit: Dir: Peyton Reed With: Kirsten Dunst, Eliza Dushku, Jesse Bradford
Outline: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

Name: D2: The Mighty Ducks
Credit: Dir: Sam Weisman With: Emilio Estevez, Kathryn Erbe, Michael Tucker
Outline: Gordon Bombay is forced to withdraw from the minor hockey league with a knee injury. Much to his surprise...

Name: Goal II: Living the Dream
Credit: Dir: Jaume Collet-Serra With: Kuno Becker, Alessandro Nivola, Anna Friel
Outline: When Newcastle United soccer star Santiago Munez is offered a spot with Real Madrid, he accepts, but the move - accompanied by big money and fame - tests his ties and loyalties to family, friends and business acquaintances.

Name: Days of Thunder
Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Tom Cruise, Nicole Kidman, Robert Duvall
Outline: A young hot-shot stock car driver gets his chance to compete at the top level.

Name: The Karate Kid, Part II
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Pat Morita, Ralph Macchio, Pat E. Johnson
Outline: Daniel accompanies his mentor to Okinawa who is off to see his dying father and confront his old rival, while Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.

Name: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Genre: Animation | Action | Adventure | Family | Sci-Fi | Sport
Credit: Dir: Kunihiko Yuyama, Michael Haigney With: Veronica Taylor, Rachael Lillis, Eric Stuart
Outline: Scientists genetically create a new PokÃ©mon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Name: The Ringer
Credit: Dir: Barry W. Blaustein With: Johnny Knoxville, Katherine Heigl, Brian Cox
Outline: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.

Name: The Fan
Credit: Dir: Tony Scott With: Robert De Niro, Wesley Snipes, Ellen Barkin
Outline: An all star baseball player becomes the unhealthy focus of a down on his luck salesman.

Name: Semi-Pro
Credit: Dir: Kent Alterman With: Will Ferrell, Woody Harrelson, AndrÃ© Benjamin
Outline: Jackie Moon, the owner-coach-player of the American Basketball Association's Flint Michigan Tropics, rallies his teammates to make their NBA dreams come true

Name: Nacho Libre
Credit: Dir: Jared Hess With: Jack Black, Ana de la Reguera, HÃ©ctor JimÃ©nez
Outline: Berated all his life by those around him, a monk follows his dream and dons a mask to moonlight as a Luchador (Mexican wrestler).

Name: Blue Crush
Credit: Dir: John Stockwell With: Kate Bosworth, Michelle Rodriguez, Matthew Davis
Outline: As a hard-core surfer girl prepares for a big competition, she finds herself falling for a football player.

Name: Over the Top
Credit: Dir: Menahem Golan With: Sylvester Stallone, Robert Loggia, Susan Blakely
Outline: Lincoln Hawk is a trucker and arm wrestler who attempts to reconcile with his estranged son and win the world arm wrestling championship.

Name: The Benchwarmers
Credit: Dir: Dennis Dugan With: David Spade, Jon Heder, Rob Schneider
Outline: A trio of guys try and make up for missed opportunities in childhood by forming a three-player baseball team to compete against standard children baseball squads.

Name: Fighting
Credit: Dir: Dito Montiel With: Channing Tatum, Terrence Howard, Luis GuzmÃ¡n
Outline: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

Name: Kicking & Screaming
Credit: Dir: Jesse Dylan With: Will Ferrell, Robert Duvall, Josh Hutcherson
Outline: Family man Phil Weston, a lifelong victim of his father's competitive nature, takes on the coaching duties of a kids' soccer team, and soon finds that he's also taking on his father's dysfunctional way of relating...

Name: Balls of Fury
Credit: Dir: Robert Ben Garant With: Dan Fogler, Christopher Walken, George Lopez
Outline: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng.

Name: Mr. Woodcock
Credit: Dir: Craig Gillespie With: Billy Bob Thornton, Seann William Scott, Susan Sarandon
Outline: Taken aback by his mother's wedding announcement, a young man returns home in an effort to stop her from marrying his old high school gym teacher, a man who made high school hell for generations of students.

Name: Rocky V
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young
Outline: Reluctantly retired from boxing and back from riches to rags, Rocky takes on a new protege who betrays him; As the champ's son must adjust to his family's new life after bankruptcy.

Name: The Karate Kid, Part III
Credit: Dir: John G. Avildsen With: Ralph Macchio, Pat Morita, Robyn Lively
Outline: Ostracised villain John Kreese attempts to gain revenge on Daniel and Miyagi, with the help of a Vietnam War comrade, the wealthy owner of a toxic waste disposal business.

Name: Herbie Fully Loaded
Genre: Adventure | Comedy | Family | Fantasy | Romance | Sport
Credit: Dir: Angela Robinson With: Lindsay Lohan, Michael Keaton, Cheryl Hines
Outline: Maggie Peyton, the new owner of Number 53 - the free-wheelin' Volkswagen bug with a mind of its own - puts the car through its paces on the road to becoming a NASCAR competitor.

Name: Driven
Credit: Dir: Renny Harlin With: Sylvester Stallone, Kip Pardue, Til Schweiger
Outline: A young hot shot driver is in the middle of a championship season and is coming apart at the seams. A former CART champion is called in to give him guidance.

Name: The Love Guru
Credit: Dir: Marco Schnabel With: Mike Myers, Jessica Alba, Romany Malco
Outline: Pitka an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge: To settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.
